column2: I'm not saying that this is the most innovative or unique establishment around. Far from it. What blows me away about Bavette's
column4: is its versatility and its incredible
column6: flawless execution in every possible aspect of the experience
column7: from the moment you walk in the door until the second you leave. Different places may do different things
column8: but I have never seen a restaurant that does what they choose to do as well as Bavette's does
